name: DeathSwap
description:
This is my first ever game i've built! 
and it's a submission to the Mini Game Jam 72 
(https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-72-adventure)

All the coding and assets were created by me, apart from the sound effects where i used the Bfxvr sound effect generator, which you can find here (https://www.bfxr.net/).

It's a relatively short game but i'll definitely be updating this after the jam!

You can find me at:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/notOfflical
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWVmlRt9fd8XzlwmFiWhP2w

and if you want to really get in contact with me, you can contact me via discord:
Offlical#6224
